油漆（paint的过去式和过去分词）
画家的；美术的；开放式画风的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指广义的“图画”，现多用来指相片、画像。
通常指只画出物体主要特征的图画。
指插入书页之间帮助说明的任何插图或图解。
多指科技书籍或文献中具有概括解说作用的图表、图样或略图。
指用线条或色彩绘成的图画。

word_group.brief_definition: 腊画的；上釉烧入彩色的；用彩色黏土镶嵌后烧制而成的；彩色的
人体画；车身涂装；人体彩绘
不朽的画作；意义深远的画
涂装工作；喷漆作业；上漆工作
宝贵的画作；无价的画作

bilingual.source: Do you plan to join the Painting Club?
bilingual.target: 你打算加入绘画俱乐部吗？

bilingual.source: My cousin is very interested in painting.
bilingual.target: 我的表弟对绘画非常感兴趣。

bilingual.source: What can you learn from Han Gan's way of painting?
bilingual.target: 你能从韩干的绘画方式中学到什么？

bilingual.source: Sounds nice! Do you plan to join the Painting Club?
bilingual.target: 听起来不错！你打算加入绘画俱乐部吗？

bilingual.source: Many students have hobbies, such as reading, painting, growing vegetables and looking after animals.
bilingual.target: 许多学生有爱好，比如阅读、绘画、种菜和照顾动物。

bilingual.source: Wang Wei decided to sponsor the young man to study painting and recommended him to a master.
bilingual.target: 王维决定资助这个年轻人学习绘画，并把他推荐给一位大师。

yingyinNormal.en: So it's possible that our lives are really just acting out a painting on the largest canvas in the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以有可能我们的生活真的只是在宇宙这张最大的画布上表演绘画而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Checking out my can? We stole that because finally someone expressed my love of soup in painting form. Wow. Woo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看我的罐头图？偷这个是因为终于有人以绘画的形式表达出我对汤的爱。哇哦。喔。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are painting today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治今天要画画。

yingyinNormal.en: You've always had a fondness for painting, haven't you, Dolores?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一向喜欢画画，对吧，德洛丽丝？

yingyinNormal.en: And that was his favorite painting. Michelangelo. God creating Adam.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是他最爱的一幅画。米开朗基罗，上帝创造亚当。

yingyinNormal.en: I loved painting when I was a young piggy. Now where are my old painting things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我小时候也很喜欢画画，我以前画的画都去哪里啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy's painting isn't spoiled, Peppa. It's perfect. Hooray. Oh, Yes. I am a bit of an expert at painting. And so are the ducks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸的画并没有被破坏呀，佩奇。非常的完美！好嘞！噢，没错。看来我真的是一位专业的画家。还有鸭子们也是。

yingyinNormal.en: Naughty ducks. Ducks. Stay away from our painting. Oh, no. The ducks have made paint footprints all over the painting. Oh, dear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 走开走开！淘气的鸭子们！走开！鸭子！走开！离我的画远一点！噢，糟糕！鸭子们在画上留上了很多脚印噢，糟糕！

yingyinNormal.en: I really love that painting. She kind of looks like you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真的很喜欢这幅画，她看起来有点像你。

yingyinNormal.en: Silly George. Big children do not put their hands in the paint. George loves painting with his hands. Peppa loves painting with her hands.
yingyinNormal.zh: 淘气的乔治！大孩子是不会把手放到颜料里去的。乔治喜欢用手来画画，佩奇也喜欢用手来画画。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, too bad you're not as strong as the dude in the painting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可惜你不像画中的男人婆那么壮。

yingyinNormal.en: That's a lovely picture, Peppa. Yes. I am very good at painting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这恐龙画得真不错。当然啦，画画可是我的特长呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeh. Yeh. She loved the face painting. Ha. Told you it was a great idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，对，她喜欢画脸，哈，告诉你了这是个好主意。

yingyinNormal.en: What is with you Americans and the foot? I hate that painting, by the way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们美国人为啥什么都要扯到脚啊？顺便说一嘴，我讨厌那幅画。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't have to say good night to painting Amy, 'cause she's never leaving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不用对画里的艾米说再见，因为她一直都在。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what can I bring you from the market? A rose. Like the one in the painting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，要我从市场给你带点什么过来？一支玫瑰，像画里的那样。

yingyinNormal.en: What was all that noisy? Mummy, the ducks have spoiled our painting. Let me see.
yingyinNormal.zh: 刚才的是什么声音呀？妈妈，鸭子们把我们的画都给毁了。让我来看看。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it wasn't spray painting a Lightning Bolt on my briefcase, I can tell you that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这至少不是牛头不对马嘴的。

yingyinNormal.en: The ducks are making paint footprints in the garden just like the ones on the painting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鸭子们在花园里留下了很多脚印就和画上的脚印一样

yingyinNormal.en: George is not very good at painting. Well, maybe you could help him? Yes, I'm very good!
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治不是很会画画。那么也许你能帮帮他？是的，我很会画画。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 画家；油漆匠；艇首缆；系艇索
adj. 着色的；描画的；刷上油漆的

word_family.mean: n. 油漆；涂料；花马；杂色马；涂颜料；涂脂抹粉；化妆；三秒区；绘图功能

examination_example.sentence: The limitations of your <highlight>painting</highlight> materials means that what you start out trying to achieve may not come to life the way that you expected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绘画材料的局限性意味着你开始想要呈现的效果最终可能并不会像你期望的那样实现。

examination_example.sentence: You also quickly learn to adapt and come up with creative solutions to the problems the <highlight>painting</highlight> presents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你也会很快学会适应并想出创造性的解决方案来解决绘画中出现的问题。

examination_example.sentence: Derek Jarman's yellow-tinted film Towards Avebury evokes a tradition of English landscape <highlight>painting</highlight> stretching from Samuel Palmer to Paul Nash.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 德里克·贾曼的电影《埃夫伯里之旅》以黄色为色调，唤起了从塞缪尔·帕尔默绵延至保罗纳什的英国风景绘画的传统。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

sense_info_list.en: the skill or activity of making a picture or putting paint on a wall

examination_example.sentence_trans: “大游客”(Grand Tourist)经常得通过获得私人收藏家的许可才能欣赏到绘画和雕塑作品。

word_usage.usage: 表示“图片上”，“画面上”用in the painting，不用on the painting。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 画家；油漆匠；艇首缆；系艇索

word_family.mean: n. 油漆；涂料；花马；杂色马；涂颜料；涂脂抹粉；化妆；三秒区；绘图功能

examination_example.sentence: Alexandre Orion turned one of Sao Paulo's transport tunnels into an amazing wall <highlight>painting</highlight> in 2006 by getting rid of the dirt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Alexandre Orion 在2006年通过清除泥土将圣保罗的一条运输隧道变成了一幅令人惊叹的壁画。

examination_example.sentence: Made up of a series of white skulls (颅骨) , the <highlight>painting</highlight> reminds drivers of the effect their pollution is having on the planet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这幅画由一系列白色头骨组成，提醒司机他们的污染正在对地球造成影响。

examination_example.sentence: The mirror and two <highlight>paintings</highlight> are here.

sense_info_list.en: the skill or activity of making a picture or putting paint on a wall

examination_example.sentence: He was good at <highlight>painting</highlight> white skulls.

examination_example.sentence: The Pompidou Centre in Paris is showing its respect for the artist with an exhibition bringing together over 200 <highlight>paintings</highlight> and more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴黎蓬皮杜中心举办了一场展览，汇集了200多幅绘画等作品，以表达对这位艺术家的尊重。

sense_info_list.en: the skill or activity of making a picture or putting paint on a wall

examination_example.sentence: He spent time improving his <highlight>painting</highlight> skills and began to sell his <highlight>paintings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他花时间提高自己的绘画技巧，并开始出售他的画。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

examination_example.sentence: Students always take their <highlight>painting</highlight> lessons outsides.

word_usage.usage: 表示“图片上”，“画面上”用in the painting，不用on the painting。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指用线条或色彩绘成的图画。
指广义的"图画"，现多用来指照片、画像。
